website_summaries.verdict: Available in four colors and boasting an attractive plaid design that is also effective at removing dirt and debris, this model is a good option for users interested in the look of a mat as well as its functionality.
pros: We think users will love the look of this mat, with enough color options to match most schemes or decor
Great for removing outdoor material from shoes
Plaid design creates grooves for trapping dirt
DuraLoop thread technology works great for brushing shoes in a few steps
The waterproof material can be cleaned with a hose
cons: Users report this model creases easily when folded, and the creases are difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-Color Gray is Significantly Lighter than Picture
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Size is perfect. Rubbery smell when opened but will be outside our front door under a covered porch so it should dissipate. Also wrinkled from folds.....see pic.....should be shipped rolled not folded. Terribly disappointed in the color "gray".......It's more like gunmetal or stainless steel.....see my pic vs. then pull up amazon's pic. Color was important because the darker gray in the Amazon pic matches our storm-door hardware. If I had known color issue I would have ordered brown which would have matched our siding. Quality, delivery, price .......5 stars Misleading color, smell, fold marks.......2 stars Three star overall. Extremely glad it's a "made in the USA" product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Color is not as shown and does not lay flat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray. It is a light gray, unlike what it pictured. It is a plastic feel. I wasn't expecting that either. It came folded up and smashed into a small plastic envelope. I didn't like the color or texture, but didn't want the hassle to send it back. I laid it out and the deep folds still have not settled a month later. I told the seller of my issue and was told to put it in the dryer... ??? But its plastic. It's useless to me at this point. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: PCass

customer_reviews.title: Extremely water resistant
customer_reviews.text: It is very flat and it is hard to wipe your feet on. It is very water resistant, which I did not realize how bad that is for walking up wooden stairs. It really servers no purpose expect protecting the floor undernearth it and maybe slipping. I am buying a new mat.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Creases in mat will disappear when placed flat. It took a few days to straighten out. Also, the mat is not heavy enough to resist wind for outdoor use. Mine is on a covered front porch butt the wind caught it anyway, flipping it into wrinkles. That concerns me because other could also catch the edge and trip. I order a heavier mat for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Gej

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean, but great for indoor/outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the texture & feel to it. It's basically plastic. Which is great for us, we have it by our backdoor to it catches our dog running in & out with mud or wet paws during winter. She got mud on it and I had a super hard time cleaning into the fibers. And when it came, it had a fold in it from how it was folded. We've had it several weeks and I can still see the fold.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Creases from product being folded.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived folded. Creases in product did not allow product to lay flat on floor. Returned the product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not lay flat!
customer_reviews.text: Same problem as with the smaller mat except it is worse with this large one. It will not lay flat no matter what you do. It comes packaged folded and I believe the mat is actually stretched where the folds are. It is unacceptable. It should have been packaged rolled. I will probably toss. It’s a shame since this could have been a great mat. If there is a solution, I’d certainly like to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: dorisee

customer_reviews.title: folded mat
customer_reviews.text: backing is thin, comes folded up its been laying out for 3 wks now and still has the folds in it! I will use it in the dog house.
customer_reviews.author: deerslyr

customer_reviews.title: Door Mat?
customer_reviews.text: This was very very thin and looked nothing like a door mat to me. I think it is about the thickness of a plastic tablecloth. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: grandmacc

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very thin. Imagine a 30x40 mat folded into a 12x12 square. That's how it came packaged. I'll use it for now but will be looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AZplantlover

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good buy for snowy weather
customer_reviews.text: Ok not what I expected. Don’t be barefoot on this totally uncomfortable. Bothers the dogs feet one won’t even step on it. Probably a good buy for snowy weather. Would not have purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: JBK

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, this comes with heavy creases from packaging. HOWEVER, you'll get an email from the company as soon as the mat is delivered saying to put it in a hot dryer for 5 minutes. I did this, and it takes out the creases perfectly. I'll be using this in my open house kit as an interior mat for rainy/snowy days to scrub the dirt and water off shoes before people enter my clients homes. It's all rubber/vinyl, so it's an easy hose-off clean too. I'll still put the shoe covers out, but this should help tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Burrrrrp

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Mat arrived with creases, but they came right out after a few minutes in the dryer. We are SO happy with this purchase. It has a low profile so it does not create a trip hazard for our little one (or other family members with mobility/balance concerns), but it does an amazing job of trapping dirt, grime and moisture from getting into our house. We were constantly cleaning the floor during this slushy Ohio winter, and I have noticed a huge improvement in the few weeks that we've had this mat. My only regret is that I didn't buy this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Good mat for scraping off the outside, easy to clean, not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: The size fit my needs perfectly, which was a big deal for my space- 5 stars for that. The mat is quite durable and easily cleaned with the hose outside. It perfect for clapping, scraping the outside dirt and ice off the bottom of shoes with a simple slide, but it is not terribly absorbent. Not a big deal for me since the shoes get stacked up right next to it any ways, but if your or your dog's feet are wet from rain etc this rug isn't going to dry them off much.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice doormat
customer_reviews.text: I like this doormat. It had creases in it from packing , so I threw it in the dryer and it lays flat.. it is light weight so a strong wind can move it if it’s outside. I bought 2 one for outside my front door and the other for the inside entranceway from the garage. It’s also where the cats walk from their litter box and it collects the litter from their feet and not on my floor. Don’t know how long they will last, especially the one outside because it is so light, but the price point is good and if this one goes will probably order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Good mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size mat for a good price. If you are looking for something fancy, this probably isn’t for you. I wanted something by my back door on my enclosed porch and this fit the bill. Yes, it’s folded so there is a bit of a crease. The directions say to throw it in a heated dryer for five minutes for it to lay flat. Honestly, the crease didn’t really bother me and I didn’t feel light folding my daughter’s laundry that she left in the drying. LOL I bought the grey one and it matched my existing area rug. I may buy another for my front entrance.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Franken

customer_reviews.title: not a rug, but the right-sized waterproof mat great for catching messy dogs and snowy boots
customer_reviews.text: the photo looks like this would be a rug in thickness, but it's a thin rubbery mat that's utilitarian but not pretty, soft or absorbant. I like how it grabs dirt from my dog's feet and is waterproof. It doesn't have a 'dam' or anything to keep a lot of water from running off. I got it instead of a WaterHog because this mat is the right size--fits the space inside the door well. Not too small, just right!
customer_reviews.author: LioraLaFleur

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I got this rug to go in front of the back Patio door where our 130lb dog goes in and out. It has really helped to cut down on the water , snow and mud he tracks in. It is a very thick and durable rug which we really needed. It is a bit more plastic like then I had thought but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mason

customer_reviews.title: SO Smelly!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came folded and I put it in the dryer, just as it instructs in the pictures and description, and the wrinkles came right out - flat as a pancake. This mat seems very useful, and is exactly as described, but it STINKS! Like, really stinks. My whole house smells like a chemical plant, and I’m a little worried that since I put it in my dryer, it will make my next load of laundry smell bad. Yikes! I put it outside and will leave it there a few days t see if it clears away. Otherwise, I’ll be sending it back for sure. No normal person could tolerate this smell. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: B. Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: I almost sent it back...
customer_reviews.text: I ALMOST sent this mat back. When it came there were a lot of creases and it was square. I expected it to be rectangular (however if I would of just read the description I would of seen the dimensions - my bad). Then I read to throw it in the dryer. I did that and now it lays PERFECT outside by my front door. Now I'm 100% happy with it - square or not. Feels like it's really great quality too. It IS shipped folded. However, there are clear instructions in there telling you to put it in the dryer. This made ALL of the difference in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love These mats! This is the second one I’ve bought. They are perfect for the area between my garage and kitchen because they trap all dirt and debris coming in. It is easy to clean and can easily be hosed off outside. It is not particularly attractive, so I would not recommend it for an entry way in the front of the house
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mat just under a week. It arrived quickly (Amazon). It says to put it in the dryer on high heat for a few minutes to flatten it out. You might to try it for maybe 2 or 3 minutes. I put it in for about 5 minutes and thought it was going to fall apart. It did not. It lays perfectly flat. I have only had to adjust it once by about 1/2 inch, dogs on it constantly. I will post an update about durability, easy to clean, and absorbency, later. But so far, the snow does come off the dogs feet on this mat, rather than leaving full paw prints around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice product however it is not the carpeted material I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice product however it is not the carpeted material I thought I was buying it is very industrial and all rubberized plastic like material. Great for a mud room!
customer_reviews.author: jenD

customer_reviews.title: I love it and buying more
customer_reviews.text: I see some bad reviews about the folds in the mat that doesn't come out but if you read the directions it says to put in the dryer for 5 mins and guess what it worked, also I have washed mine several time and they come out perfect. I love it and I'm going to be buying more for my other doors I'm using mine on the inside I run a daycare and have alot of traffic
customer_reviews.author: J&M TERRETT

customer_reviews.title: These Door Mats are Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four large gray Door Mats. I am extremely impressed with the way they hug the patio floor at each of the doors coming in to the house, & one additionally inside the patio door. They are capturing dirt, and helping me to keep our home cleaner with two puppies that love to run outside & pick up lots of sand in their fur. Yes, they did come folded, but that has not been a problem once they were laid down on the ground. These mats can even be vacuumed without the vacuum sucking it up into its roller. They look good, as well. This is a wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and attractive mat...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for inside the front door. I was concerned about the appearance of the plastic fibers on the top surface, but now that I have it, I like the way it looks. Not as industrial-looking as some mats (a good thing) but every bit as sturdy and functional. And it doesn't move around when you walk on it. It was creased out of the box, but 5 minutes in the dryer, as directed, completely solved that. Now it's flat as a pancake and the door opens without touching it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fermata

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat behind the back seat of my suv to cover up the slippery plastic floor. The dogs ride back there, and prior to getting this mat, they would slide around and be very uncomfortable. Now they have a soft floor to sit on and do not bounce around. It just so happened that this size fit the space to a tee, so I am happy that I did not have to cut it as I can take it out and place in the large crate that they use. I don't know know what the material is, but it has a woven type texture - some kind of synthetic material that works well. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dry Heat

customer_reviews.title: More of an outdoor mat than a rug
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with "rug" at all. First, it had to be placed in the dryer to remove extreme folds from shipping. Second, it is NOT a rug material, it is more of an outdoor loop. Third, we needed a non-slip rug for our dog to be able to stand on while eating or drinking as she has neurological problems. This will be very difficult (if not impossible) to keep clean. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Use your clothes dryer for 3 minutes to get out wrinkles before lying flat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. Measured 42"x35". Took the advice of another reviewer and took it out of the package and put it directly into the dryer for about 3 minutes. Hot from the dryer all wrinkles were gone. Yes it smells like plastic because it is plastic, and the dryer exacerbated the smell slightly but it wasn't bad. Lies perfectly flat, doesn't slide on our tile floor. The gray color was as expected for us. It is thin but its what we needed, and the door can actually swing over it without impingement.
customer_reviews.author: Physick

customer_reviews.title: nice mat!
customer_reviews.text: I was anticipating that this mat would be a lot rougher than it is. It's actually comfortable to walk on with bare feet! The size seemed right when I was ordering but it ships so compactly, I was worried that it wasn't going to be big enough. But then I unfolded it and it fits perfectly just like I'd originally thought it would. Have had it installed for a month or so outside and it does the job well!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Gray Mat Perfect for Front Porch
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and am very happy with it. The color is pretty: a soft, medium gray and not that darker “charcoal” that so many rugs claim as gray. I laid it in front of the front door and it coordinates nicely with gray painted porch. The mat looks almost square, but I measured it and the dimensions are 42” x 35”. I would have really loved a more rectangular mat but I’m so happy with the color and the fact that it’s bigger than 36” x 24” that the shape is a non-issue. The textured duraloop and diagonal pattern add a bit of interest and isn’t overdone.
customer_reviews.author: Oneinamillion

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT... PERFECT SIZE FOR LARGE ENTRYWAYS
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I bought 2 more. They lay down nicely and look nice too. They actually catch debris before you enter your home. I use one in the garage so I don't track leaves and stuff into the house. It's easy to hose off and you can just lay it in the sun to dry. They did not pay me to leave this review... I actually love the product. At this price, how can you go wrong not to try one yourself and see.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Creases and Smell! same issues as other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel comfortable putting such a heavy plastic item in my clothes dryer to get the wrinkles out so I decided to cover them with very heavy boxes. The creases are one problem, but my bigger problem was the smell of these. It has a very strong chemical smell that gave me an instant headache. Put in garage for 2 weeks and the smell is finally manageable. The creases remain but are much better at least. On the plus side, these do seem very durable and easy to clean, but I would not purchases them again.
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: So flimsy it's torn out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the grey Jumbo rug and it's so flimsy it's torn on the edges right out of the box. We bought this for our business and it's honest junk. I dislike leaving such a negative review, but this is terrible. I would maybe pay 3$ for a rug of this quality. I was expecting something durable and long lasting. Look elsewhere if you want quality.
customer_reviews.author: N. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks great outside of our french doors. So good, in fact, that I'm buying another one for the other set of doors! It doesn't cover the entire area, but placed right in the middle, it's pretty close and still looks great. There are creases out of the box, but I just received a follow-up e-mail from the seller, which instructed me to throw it in the dryer on hot for five (and only five) minutes. I'll be doing that! :) Thank you, seller!
customer_reviews.author: Stacia L. Manion

customer_reviews.title: Good indoor/garage door mat
customer_reviews.text: Larger than you think it would be. This is a good mat. It's a little on the thin side but it definitely is strong and durable. I was surprised at its grip power given it's not heavy like some mats that have a more carpeted feel. This one feels like plastic turf grass. Keeps dirt off my carpets well. I have it in my foyer.
customer_reviews.author: havilland

customer_reviews.title: I love these mats.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first mat for my furnace room, which has a cement floor. It looks so nice and works so well that I bought a second one for my front porch last summer. I recently bought a third one for my utility room, which has an entry from the garage. It keeps the garage floor silt from tracking into the house. The mats are everything claimed in the ads. They are easy to clean, lie in place without shifting, are very durable. (The first one I bought more than a year ago and still looks like new.) The price is certainly reasonable. I recommend them highly!
customer_reviews.author: Homebody

customer_reviews.title: Likely a rare find.......
customer_reviews.text: Size & fabric material a pleasant surprise, must have been made custom for my back entry landing @ 36" X 45" ! Folded for shipping, placing in dryer for 5 minutes (as advised) erased any evidence of folds. Substantial heft to the mat, bottom is solid (shouldn't meander I would think) while top is difficult to describe....kinda of a "open mesh type" (?) design that is probably precisely what you would want for persons entering to automatically remove "unwanteds" from the bottom of their shoes simply by walking across it! If it meets my expectations , it is priceless!
customer_reviews.author: redford

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 mats a couple years ago and loved them. When I moved, I ordered a new one. When it arrived I noticed the design stamped into it was incomplete. Since I already knew it was a good product, I emailed the company asking about the design and if I should return it. They responded in less than 24hrs letting me know I could keep the defective one, and they would send a new one. I received the new one in about a week, and it’s perfect. The customer service is excellent, and I’m very please with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Pandamando

customer_reviews.title: Does not absorb water
customer_reviews.text: Cute design and good material for the entry way. Unfortunately this rug doesn’t absorb any water, it simply sits on top of it to get tracked everywhere, or goes through onto the floor. I had to replace this rug with one that would actually absorb water and moved this one to a door we don’t use that often. Probably won’t buy again for that reason. Although if you don’t track in much rain/water where you live, I do recommend this rug
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry mat
customer_reviews.text: I got the mat delivered before the promised date. It was folded and straightened out in a short time. I was able to put it down on the floor right away. Some other reviewers had said it didn't lay flat due to the way it was packaged. That wasn't a problem for me. It's the perfect size for the entryway, and all I do so far is shake it out to get the dirt removed. We'll see how it is to clean it in the winter. Anyway, I'm very happy with it. It's affordable and does what I bought it for. 08/11/2018
customer_reviews.author: sweetfreedom

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor rug
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t I think of this before? I have always used throw rugs in my kitchen in front of the back door. I went thru them quickly because of the dirt tracked in and the many washings to keep them clean. This rug looks very nice and I can sweep it off or hose it off to keep it clean. It keeps the dirt off my wood floors and looks great. I am saving up to buy 3 more for the front door, in front of the kitchen sink and a longer one in front of my island.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this rug! I use it outside my door on the patio, so it’s on a concrete surface. It absorbs nothing because it’s plastic, yet the “duraloop” catches everything! Leaves, pine needles, dog hair, etc. gets trapped in the woven surface and is difficult to remove. Don’t imagine that this is a rubber-backed fabric rug. The photo is misleading. It is very light-weight, thin, plastic. It is waterproof, but the concrete beneath the rug stays wet for days after a rain.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT OUTDOOR MAT
customer_reviews.text: Don't worry about the wrinkles when you open the package. We bought this mat so our big black Lab could have a defined spot safe from the rockers on the cement porch at the front door. We put it on the floor indoors and within 2 days it was presentable. An additional day outside in the sun and it hugged the cement like a glove. The dog loves it and it keeps his tail out of harm's way with the rockers. Easy to shake off any accumulated debris. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Violet P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: It is so fashionable and durable. I wouldn't say it's the easiest to clean if you have pets (I have two huskies that have thrown up on it and it's sooooo hard to get it clean, even with the hose). However, it's super easy to vacuum, sticks to the tile floor nicely so it doesn't slide around, and doesn't hold the smell of dog as much as other mats I've had, since they lay on it constantly. I've purchased another one after having the first for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy If You Can Follow Directions
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, but I am pleasantly surprized. So the material is like that spongy rubber that was very popular for beach sandals in the early 2000s. I almost didn't gwt this item based on the reviews which stated that it was creased from shipping and would never lay flat: These people cannot read or follow directions. The manufacturer clearly points out that you must put it in the dryer for 5 minutes on high and then let it cool off a minute prior to use. I love this mat so much I will probably get second one for my front door as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Rubber mats that do what they are supposed to do!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our 5th wheel and other camping trailer. I didn't read the description very well... they are a rubber material, so I have put them in my mudroom. They had a VERY strong order when I opened it up, but after leaving them outside overnight, it was gone. This mat catches everything that comes in the door!! Very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months the rugs began to rot and tear. Two of the three stuck to the concrete and ripped as they were pulled loose. To be fair, they did good in the beginning, but they lifespan was way too short. Also, the rugs are very light and would blow away or corners would blow back in a slight breeze. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dog House

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of the same mat to put around my home. They're very useful in the messy winter weather. I'm extremely pleased with the design, quality, and cost of this product; as well as the delivery time it took to get to me. I'm sure I will be ordering from this company in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This front door mat looks awful. It came folded up instead of rolled up. Its fully rubber. I dont know if it will ever straighten out.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Catches Dirt, Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these doormats and ordered another just like it for the other side of our sunroom. The second came and the creases would not come out. I then got an email from the company telling me how to remedy the situation. I did what they recommended, and it was fine. What customer service that they would contact customers to tell them of a possible problem and how to remedy this. This is definitely a first class company and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: ARTIST49

customer_reviews.title: Tough, grabs dirt, large door mat
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th one purchased. They work very well for me. Hard wearing. I have them on almost all the in side & outer side of each outside door (will buy 1 more to complete that pairing). Have tried many other types/sizes. The gray matches my flooring nicely. A hosing off of mud & dirt cleans them - they dry fast in the sunshine. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: S. Green

customer_reviews.title: Not As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Seems cheap and plastic-like. Thought from the description that it was made from rubber. Did not feel comfortable putting it in the dryer as the accompanying instructions recommended because of the material. Also had a very strong odor that caused a bit of headache when in a small enclosed area. Should have read the 1 star reviews, everything mentioned in them is accurate
customer_reviews.author: AndrewBJanes

customer_reviews.title: Made of rubber/plastic. Decent but will not absorb moisture.
customer_reviews.text: So this thing does the truck but is made entirely of some form of rubber or plastic. This means that it will not absorb anything and then the consistency makes it nearly impossible to get all of the dirt out of. It's definitely durable but if you are looking for something to wipe your feet on when you come in the house, remember that this mat will not absorb any moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Vita Haus

customer_reviews.title: Nice doormats
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of these doormats. This is the second time I ordered this product only in a different color. This time the fabrication feels thinner than the first doormats in a darker color. Maybe it is a color issue. I got darker gray the first time and light gray this time. Seller had the product to me quickly.
customer_reviews.author: HikerKing

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it will perform well...asked to review just days after receiving it!
customer_reviews.text: I am completing this review by request of the vendor. I have had this mat for only a few days, so I am unable to provide real ratings for absorbency, cleaning, and durability. I suspect that it will perform nicely over time. Well made. Suggestion for future requests for reviews, wait a month or so and you'll likely get better reviews!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Door Mat!
customer_reviews.text: We live on dirt roads, so we really needed something to help keep the dirt at the door. These mats are great - like the instructions stated, just pop them into the dryer to get the folds out, and they are ready to go. I have one at every entry way, and plan to buy more. Plus, super important, made in MICHIGAN. I love to buy local, and support local workers. Great job on a super cool mat! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Put it in the dryer to eliminate the folds
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this rug. Ignore reviews about it being folded and just throw it in your dryer for a few minutes after it arrives. It’s definitely no-slip on top of my piano finish floors, even with my massive galloping dogs running across it. The size is unusual but obviously made for practical use in modern spaces. Lastly, it may be a mud mat, but until you touch it you think it’s carpeted; it’s not ugly like other mud mats. Leaving this review as I’m here to order another one for my back door. Thanks for the thoughtfully made product—it’s solving a lot of muddy kid+dog+husband problems for me :) (Mine is gray, using inside.)
customer_reviews.author: BeKelleyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Lies flat and stays put
customer_reviews.text: It did come out of the package with folding wrinkles. I put in the dryer as suggested for 5 minutes and viola the wrinkles came out. I put it outside for a bit to air out as it is a rubber product and has a slight smell. Then put it by our back down on top of carpet. It cleared our door fine. Dogs have no problem stepping on it. I haven't cleaned it yet but looks like it can be shook outside easily.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Please roll for packing, not fold!
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug, but the packaging could be improved. Rolling instead of folding would allow the allow the rug to lie flat. The rug has been down for a week, and still has these major fold marks. UPDATE! I tried someone’s suggestion of taking a hair dryer to it, and what a difference! Heat with the hair dryer, and place something moderately heavy on top while it cools. Worked wonders! I’m upgrading my rating to 5 stars. And I was super happy to see that it’s made in Michigan, which is where I’ve lived my entire life ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Natalie may colvin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and durable to boot
customer_reviews.text: The door mats I order look good and function very well. We just had 10 inches of snow and I’m glad to say the mats did their job. My floors stayed dry and the wet mess and salt stayed on the mats. We shook the mats out and put them back down. They look just as good as when I received them a few weeks ago. The one thing that surprised me was the material they are made of. They actually look like any ordinary carpet though and fit nicely in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing widow

customer_reviews.title: Not your traditional mat
customer_reviews.text: Rather odd looking texture and light weight but it lays nice ( you have to get the folds out) and is soft . Mine is gray and looks good on the gray porch . Best of all it doesn’t trip, wipes feet well, continues to look clean, and holds less of my cats hair than the traditional rubber mat I had . I purchased it to begin with because it is a little larger than most mats. When I first took it out of the box I though I had wasted money but at this juncture I would buy it again .
customer_reviews.author: Trapper

customer_reviews.title: Fit and "LOOK" are great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same gray door mat about a year ago...liked it so much I just ordered & received another one for a different spot. 5 stars for the nice large size, the "look" and the way the first one has held up! I definitely would recommend this door mat and the company who makes it. They have sent me emails to check on how the mat is doing. That is the kind of customer service that makes me happy I spent my/our money with them!
customer_reviews.author: DRW

customer_reviews.title: Utilitarian not designer.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a beautiful rug, but it’s perfect inside the dog door in my laundry room. It traps a lot of dirt from giant hairy paws and prevents the sand dune effect in my house. It did come creased, but I warmed it with the hot setting on my blow dryer and laid it flat with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Chadwell

customer_reviews.title: The  Universal mat keeps your floors clean and shoes dry
customer_reviews.text: To begin with I liked that it just took 5 minutes in the dryer to flatten it out before putting it outside. Once outside it layed perfect under the door, it didn’t curl up or hit the door at all. It can be brushed off to remove dirt, salt and anything else that gets on it. Water runs off it easily. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Menger

customer_reviews.title: Looks as if it will do just what I need
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good and the open weave style means it should trap dirt and snow effectively. I haven't used it much yet so time will tell on durability. I gave it 15 minutes in the dryer (5 was inadequate) and it flattened out nicely. I'm thinking I should get another so that tells you what I think of the value.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Looks goo, lightweight, easy to keep clean, helps keep mud/rain off of our laminate floors.
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far- it was perfect size for our patio door - I was having a hard time finding one to fit as most were too small. Also, this feels pretty good underneath your feet even though it isn't carpet. My husband works from home in shop out back so comes in and out of house a lot - nice unless he has muddy wet shoes. This has helped with that since we have had a bunch of rain- the dark color helps since it doesn't show dirt like the light gray carpet rug we had before.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bain

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting at all but I actually like it better than what I was expecting. I thought this was going to be a carpet rug with a plastic backing but ended up being all rubber no carpet at all. I like this better becuase its doesnt ever get dirty and dried faster. When it starts to have dirt in it you can take it outside and shake it and it's like new again. If you ever want to wash it you just have to rinse it off.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Mats are winning in my High foot traffic home
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our mats a few days and we LOVE them! I went from sweeping several times a day to only twice! And mopping was every day now every other day! LOVE these mats! We have LOTS of foot traffic in our home both 2 and 4 legged! These mats are a GREAT BUY! 3 dogs and 10+ people are not match for these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Nice doormat
customer_reviews.text: This went outside my front door. Nice color. Attractive design. Too early to rate absorbency, ease off cleaning, or durability. I've only had it a few days. I love the looks of it. It co-ordinates so well with the grey stone on the front of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stupid to fold
customer_reviews.text: got this mat a month ago and it still doesn't lay flat, it's a tripping hazard....you've had many complaints about folding instead of rolling, you need to listen to your customers.....I would highly recommend not to buy this mat...nice mat but what good is it with humps in it ??? very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: roseburg97471

customer_reviews.title: Really protect the floors and clean easily
customer_reviews.text: Have been using them indoors to protect the floor from puppy accidents and muddy paws! They hold the water and are so easy to take out side and spray off or simply wipe down. They re cushy as well and look really nice by the door! Very well made! You do need to air them out when they first arrive as have strong odor but this disappears quickly! They do not slip or slide!
customer_reviews.author: Cc customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat that is a good deal, low pile, handles dirt and snow well
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our entry way and liked it so much that we got another to go right outside. It doesn't slip which is nice and it handles dirt and water well. The only problem is that it is not very absorbent. Overall, it's a much better mat than the previous ones we had that slipped.
customer_reviews.author: Just listen

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so I can't say if it will be durable and easy to clean or if it absorbs. I like the size and the color for my home so I got 2 and so far I am happy with my purchase. There are lines when you get it but I set it that way anyway and it is not bothering my door. I also got instructions on how to get rid of the lines by putting it in the dryer for about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mat. Soft under your feet. Better than expected. Very happy with my purchase. Wrinkles came out after having it in the dryer for less than five minutes. Had a plastic odor for about ten minutes after but went away. Highly recommend seller.
customer_reviews.author: T. G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great! Rugged and durable! I had one at my camp and liked it so well, I ordered another. My wife like it so well, she had me order one for our home. Everything stays on the rug. They are very thick and remove mud and debris from your shoes easily. They would be great for a mud room. And they are made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: mhcrane

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Had to change from 5 stars to 3. It has not held up well. Started falling apart after a few months and it will probably need to be replaced soon. We've been using it about 7-8 months. It wasn't exactly what I was expecting when delivered. I guess I missed the material type description. This is not your typical fabric rug but it is awesome! My front yard is currently dug up and it manages to trap the massive amounts of dirt being tracked in. Its also much easier to wash off when my puppy has an accident by the door. I'll be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with the asthmatic or quality of this product. It is not a durable mat with a rubber backer but rather it’s all made out of the same material. Is thin and does not feel like it will last. Bought to put in front of my washing machine in garage and am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 14th_Monkey

customer_reviews.title: SlipToGrip floor mat a nice buy
customer_reviews.text: SlipToGrip floor mat looks nice and appears well made; we expect it will be quite durable. Have not had it long enough to get it dirty, so don't know yet how easy it will be to clean. We liked the price and also the color selection. We have it just outside the door leading into the house from the garage, and expect we will get many years of good-looking dirt-catching use!
customer_reviews.author: Rcam

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and practical doormat...
customer_reviews.text: I like the doormat. When first unpackaged it, it had a pretty strong odor, but only lasted a short time. It stays in place , seems well made but haven’t had it long enough to review durability or ease of cleaning. It does collect all the dirty stuff brought into house. Like doormat.
customer_reviews.author: Dee L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets/shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat by my back door for my dogs. Works great to get mud/sand out of their pads as well as the tread on shoes. It's easy to clean also. I just take it outside and hose it down. It is a plastic/rubber mix material so it doesn't absorb anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Soft on bare feet and super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This rug is soft on bare feet, but sturdy and is very easy to squirt off with the hose. It has been awesome at out back door. I was surprised at how lightweight it was when it arrived, but after 2 months of constant use on an unprotected stoop I am very pleased with how its held up. It still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Attractive welcome mat
customer_reviews.text: I have a slippery landing at my front door entrance, and have bought several varieties of mats. They have all been blah, or let water slip underneath, or failed in so many ways. This mat is very attractive for the purpose it serves. Lays nicely on the landing, so I'm anxious to see how well it preforms in bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The rug is better than I expected. When I first opened, the folding lines stayed visible until I put the rug in the sun for a couple of hours... now it lays beautifully in my front entry. Excellent buying, I’d recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: R. guimaraes

customer_reviews.title: This rug is great by my front door
customer_reviews.text: This rug is great by my front door. It's not really a rug to which I had thought it was. But has a rug appearance. It catches all the snow and salt that gets dragged in here in these cold MI winters. Easy to clean. Looks as if it would be a rough surface but it is not. It's a rubber material. And waterproof which is a plus. I put two by my front door and threw a tray for our boots and shoes on the other one. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ash224

customer_reviews.title: It arrived 5 minutes ago and I was so impressed with it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived 5 minutes ago. I was so impressed with the size, color, quality, I ordered another one. The instructions said to put it in a hot dryer for 5 minutes to get the wrinkles out from being folded and shipped. It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: donnafromdenver

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these, one outside and two inside. Put in the dryer for a bit and they will flatten out. They seem to contain water and dirt well. Haven’t had the inside ones long but the outside one is holding up well after one summer and a few winter months.
customer_reviews.author: MyW

customer_reviews.title: Great rug! Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! I had the fold marks when I got it so I put it in the dryer for a few just like it said and laid it by my back door and wrinkles came right out. It is great quality. I definitely recommend this rug!!🤎
customer_reviews.author: christopher holman

customer_reviews.title: Stays put.
customer_reviews.text: Using this indoors near a hot tub. The mat came folded but the creases came out after a few minutes in the clothes dryer. It doesn't slide around on a ceramic tile floor and wet feet don't slide around on the mat. Might order a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: R Malone

customer_reviews.title: The best door mat ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite door mat ever! At Thanksgiving my grandmother said she wanted one! It is so great! You can sweep it or take it out and beat it or wash it real good with the hose. It's so durable! Can't say enough good things! Perfect for dogs going in and out and kids and rain and mud and snow! Everything!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive after reading some of the negative reviews but I can't see a thing wrong with it, especially after seeing the prices on the other ones. It's a good size, totally washable and has a boot cleaning design. If I still have it after 12 years of use like the one it replaced I'll give it the fifth star.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. leeTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: One inch shorter
customer_reviews.text: This rug holds a ton of dirt out of sight. It will rip so be careful. This one is smaller than the previous one I ordered. The description says by only one inch on one side but I am pretty sure it is shorter on both sides by a few inches.
customer_reviews.author: MommaNY

customer_reviews.title: Advertisement sums it up perfectly  -- I'm Satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: Just received rug so really can't rate anything yet. It does look great and perfect size for my front door outside on covered porch. I will order another one for inside my front door because of it's low profile and non slip ability on hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhhhh LOVE this grey mat! Happy I didn’t listen to the poor reviews. It’s hasn’t slipped, or even budged an inch. Captures dirt and debris, shakes off clean, mud rinses clean...still looks great. Awesome size. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfThree

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasanley surprised!
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight stays in place. I am a Real Estate Agent and with the coming winter weather it makes a safe entry to my Open Houses, I don't need to worry that prospective buyers will slip on the entry rug. I purchased one in grey and as soon as I used it I hurried and purchased the same rug in black. Ready for my next Open House and will purchase more for home use!! Think safe and dry!!
customer_reviews.author: kathryn b virkus

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, surface turned loose after a month
customer_reviews.text: Great entryway rug. We live in the country and it catches so much off everyone’s boots. We were very happy with it but after a month of regular use the web type surface material started turning loose from the base mat in patches and left bald spots.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taitano

customer_reviews.title: GOOD MAT
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with this doormat. I'm enjoying everything about it! The size, color, texture and shape are on point! I absolutely recommend this mat. Remember to toss it in the dryer for 5 minutes before use!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Cowart

customer_reviews.title: A success
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the dryer trick, but it worked perfectly. As I've had the mat only a couple of days, I can't speak to durability, and the weather has not been really wet, so absorbency is untested. My dog has accepted it, despite being very suspicious at first. So far, it's a success.
customer_reviews.author: Shoshanah Shirah

customer_reviews.title: They are so durable!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is such a good price for the size of them and they are so durable.If I have to say something negative it would be that if a spill gets in the texture part they have to be taken out and rinsed off but I have bought several. They have been such a super help for my little aging yorkie walking around because I have put them on my slick floors so he doesn't slide and fall!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, low profile and flat (follow instruction)
customer_reviews.text: The mat looks good and feels durable. I put it in dryer for 5 minutes as instructions says to make the mat flat with no folding marks. And it works really good. It is flat and perfect for wet weather like now. Highly recommended and the price is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: FGuna1

product_meta.title: SlipToGrip Universal Gray Door Mat with DuraLoop - Jumbo 42"x35" Outdoor Indoor Entrance Doormat - Waterproof - Low Profile Door Mat - Welcome - Front Door, Garage, Patio
feature_bullets: COPYRIGHT DESIGN - UNIVERSAL DOOR MAT WITH DURALOOP: Exclusive Plaid Design that looks great in any house. For use on a patio, in a garage, laundry room, entryway, and anywhere there is high traffic from outside.
ANTI-SLIP & DURABLE - XL Size 42" by 35" A Poly Mesh (a soft durable plastic fiber) Captures dirt and debris. Provides cushion and non-slippery quality.
WEATHERPROOF SURFACE - Mats are waterproof and moisture resistant. Inside Door Mat or Outside Door Mat.
EASY TO WASH - PVC Material - Spray water through soft Polypropylene fiber and the mat will be all clean and dust-free

PHTHALATE & BPA FREE: Highest Quality outdoor / indoor mats, capturing dirt despite of using it for hours. If necessary, to remove any creases in these types of mats, you simply need to place them in the dryer for about 5 minutes on high heat and it flattens them out immediately, if wrinkled or creased during shipping

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,762 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
